messages.messages: Today's update includes several new plugins for ElizaOS. The Arbitrage plugin adds support for automatic cryptocurrency trading across decentralized exchanges. The Moralis plugin provides integration with Solana APIs and other token metadata APIs. A new Zerion plugin has also been implemented to enhance trading analytics.
Enhancements have been made to the multiversx-plugin that now allows for balance checks and a swap functionality, among other improvements.

Two crucial bugs were fixed today. The client-twitter homeTimeline name parse bug has been resolved, ensuring proper name retrieval from the Twitter API. Additionally, a formatting bug in the topic's composeState has been fixed.
Setup was completed for one-click deployments on platforms like Render.com and Railway, making the deployment process more streamlined and efficient.

Significant movements in the cryptocurrency market today include a 10.93% increase in Bitcoin, now trading at $104,692. Ethereum experienced a sharp rise of 32.91% to $3,330.07. Solana also saw gains, with a 4.22% increase, bringing its price to $256.16.
Today's development focus included enabling turbo caching, reducing build times, and optimizing performance.
Documentation updates now include detailed guides on configuring one-click deployments and multi-agent workflows, improving user accessibility.
